feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete, tangible item with defined physical boundaries.
feedback.Synthetic: Included — Manufactured through human industrial design.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — No biological origin or biomimetic qualities.
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Operates without any form of supplied energy.
feedback.Structural: Included — Its shape and elasticity exert mechanical force to hold papers together.
feedback.Observable: Included — Easily perceptible visually and tactilely.
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Made of metal wire; composed of physical matter.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Does not initiate change or behavior internally.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Included — Created explicitly to bind sheets of paper via mechanical tension.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Excluded — Does not emit energy, signal, or output beyond passive constraint.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — Performs no information processing or control.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — Does not undergo internal transformation beyond minor deformation.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Included — Requires human manipulation to function as intended.
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — Functions independently, not designed as part of a larger system.
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — Has no autonomy; entirely user-driven.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not mission-critical to any formal system or infrastructure.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — Not designed to represent anything conceptually.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not convey information or meaning through form or function.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — Not governed by formal logical or operational rules.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Single integrated object, not modular or hierarchical.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not define or prescribe behavior.
feedback.Meta: Excluded — Does not refer to its own structure or role.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — No essential temporal identity or sequencing.
feedback.Digital/Virtual: Excluded — A fully physical artifact with no virtual component.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists as a material artifact independent of social agreement.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not categorized or defined by any institution.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not tied to roles, personas, or social identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — Not subject to legal or procedural governance.
feedback.Economically Significant: Excluded — Holds negligible standalone economic value.
feedback.Politicised: Excluded — Not subject to political discourse or contention.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not used in formalized cultural or ceremonial behavior.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Excluded — Raises no moral or ethical considerations.

encoding_notes: This encoding treats the paperclip strictly as a passive, synthetic tool with no symbolic or systemic identity. All traits included are intrinsic to its form and purpose. No traits are granted based on cultural ubiquity or inferred meaning.
